EmailTemplate.name: Welcome
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to TeladocHealth Salesforce
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Welcome!
We're excited to have you get started. Please, press the button below to login using your Username : {!User.Username} and OneTime Password: {!User.OneTime_Password__c}
https://teladochealth.my.salesforce.com
If you have any questions, please email to Salesforcesupport@teladoc.com. We're' always happy to help out.
Thank you, Salesforce Support Team.
The Onetime password expires after 24 hours. After expiration, the Salesforce Admin will need to reset the password again.
